summary: This document contains a detailed log of boat trips made by Captain Carlos and Captain Tap, including staff movements and various activities related to Little St. James (LSJ) and Great St. James (GSJ) islands. It also includes notes on maintenance and cleaning activities at the properties, as well as a list of tasks and priorities for staff. This document appears to be a log of various maintenance and operational activities related to boats and equipment, including repairs, inspections, and crew attendance. It includes references to specific individuals involved in these activities, as well as details about equipment and logistical operations.

Garth and Kevin are mentioned together multiple times in staff movements.

Carlos and Garth are both involved in crew activities and logistics.
Stephen is a manager and Daphne is his executive assistant, indicating a professional relationship.

keyFacts: The document contains a detailed log of boat trips made by Captain Carlos and Captain Tap.
Staff movements between Redhook, LSJ, and GSJ are recorded with specific times.
Various maintenance and cleaning tasks are noted for the properties on LSJ and GSJ.
Security personnel are mentioned as being transported to and from LSJ and GSJ.
Multiple staff members are involved in the operations and maintenance of the properties.
Multiple crew members are involved in the maintenance and operation of boats.
Logs detail specific dates and activities related to boat repairs and crew attendance.
There are references to equipment issues and repairs needed for various boats.
